name: Cloud Cutter
descr:
The shoot ‘em up you've been waiting for!

[b]Cloud Cutter[/b] brings you classic arcade shoot ‘em up gameplay in top notch graphics. Cloud Cutter offers exactly what you expect and love in old-school scrolling shooters. 
Enjoy intense fast-paced explosive action full of epic destruction, arcade style power-ups, lasers and of course huge multi-stage boss fights.
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1584750/extras/Steam_Tg.png?t=1645603687[/img]
Blast your way through hundreds of enemies in a beautiful and ever-changing environment.  
Collect in-game [b]power-ups[/b] to upgrade your ship and deal massive damage with a number of [b]special powers[/b].
Master 13 detailed and immersive stages with challenging missions to complete that will push your pilot reflexes to their limits. Battle enormous and intimidating bosses.
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1584750/extras/Steam_Multi_Source.png?t=1645603687[/img]
It's even more fun to play with a friend. Work as a team on your way to victory!
Complete in-game objectives to unlock [b]achievements[/b].
Appreciate highly polished gameplay and detailed environments.
Enjoy an incredible atmospheric soundtrack.

This is an old-school shoot ‘em up at its finest. This is [b]Cloud Cutter![/b]
detail:
名称: Cloud Cutter
类型: 动作, 独立
开发商: Just Two ltd.
发行商: Just Two ltd.
发行日期: 2021 年 5 月 5 日
review: 全部评测: 特别好评 (85) - 此游戏的 85 篇用户评测中有 84% 为好评。
全部评测: 特别好评 (85 篇中的 84%) 发布至今
sysreq:
Windows

需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
操作系统 *: Windows 7
处理器: Intel Core i5-3570K or similar
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: NVIDIA 660 Ti or similar
DirectX 版本: 11

推荐配置:
需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
操作系统: Windows 10
处理器: Intel Core i5-7400 or better
内存: 8 GB RAM
显卡: NVIDIA 1060 GTX or better
DirectX 版本: 11
存储空间: 需要 7 GB 可用空间
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。
